Identification.ShortTitle: Minister of Indian Affairs and Northern Development Authority to Prescribe Fees Order
Identification.LongTitle: Order Under Section 13 of the Financial Administration Act Authorizing the Minister of Indian Affairs and Northern Development to Prescribe Certain Fees

Section.Text: This Order may be cited as the Minister of Indian Affairs and Northern Development Authority to Prescribe Fees Order.

The Minister of Indian Affairs and Northern Development is authorized to prescribe by order the fees to be paid by persons provided with microfilm copies of geological, geophysical and well-history data submitted pursuant to the Canada Oil and Gas Land Regulations.
